passives.name: Nightstalker
passives.effects: Your abilities deal {{as|{{rd|{{pp|0 to 22.5 for 11|0 to 70|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|showtype=false}}|{{pp|0 to 12.5 for 11|0 to 70|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|showtype=false}}}}|hp}} {{as|(based on target's '''missing''' health)}} increased damage against enemy champions. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them renders you {{tip|untargetable}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, which ends prematurely if you perform an action that {{tip|break stealth|breaks stealth}}.

effects_structured.raw: Your abilities deal {{as|{{rd|{{pp|0 to 22.5 for 11|0 to 70|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|showtype=false}}|{{pp|0 to 12.5 for 11|0 to 70|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|showtype=false}}}}|hp}} {{as|(based on target's '''missing''' health)}} increased damage against enemy champions. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them renders you {{tip|untargetable}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, which ends prematurely if you perform an action that {{tip|break stealth|breaks stealth}}.
